short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows your age and a progress bar of how long you've lived

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivate yourself to make the most of every day. With Life Progress, each time you open a new tab, you are reminded of how much life you've lived. After entering your birthday and expected life expectancy, Life Progress calculates the percentage of life you have lived based on days.
